message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $95 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with a price of $100 for the product.
